sys_script.name: SLX Calculo promedio proyecto

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_e6f7eab91b579cd0d8d6b887cc4bcb60
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_hocsa_san_encuesta_de_proyecto</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_hocsa_san_encuesta_de_proyecto">u_slx_contVALCHANGES^u_slx_sumaVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_slx_cont" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="u_slx_suma" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SLX Calculo promedio proyecto</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	
	var gr= new GlideRecord('x_hocsa_san_encuesta_de_proyecto');
	gr.addQuery('sys_id',current.sys_id);
	gr.query();
	
	if(gr.next())
		{
			if (gr.u_slx_cont > 0) {
            //se crea una variable promedio y con el metodo math round multiplicado y dividido por 10 el resultado
            //se redondea en 2 decimales
            var prom = (gr.u_slx_suma / gr.u_slx_cont);
			
            //Se setea el campo promedio por la variable promedio
			gs.addInfoMessage(prom);
			gr.u_slx_promedio_obtenido =  prom;
            gr.update();
          


        } else {
            gr.u_slx_promedio_obtenido = 0;
            gr.update();

        
	}
		}

	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>slx.bs</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-17 19:27:40</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e6f7eab91b579cd0d8d6b887cc4bcb60</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SLX Calculo promedio proyecto</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="san" source="x_hocsa_san">b3538a711ba598108802dac2cd4bcb8e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="san">b3538a711ba598108802dac2cd4bcb8e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e6f7eab91b579cd0d8d6b887cc4bcb60</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>slx.bs</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-17 19:32:03</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e6f7eab91b579cd0d8d6b887cc4bcb60"/></record_update>
